universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a friendly, modern, intelligent feel.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) for maximum contrast text.
All containers with borders MUST have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
Implement 'framer-motion' for page transitions and list item entrance animations.
Dashboard must feel 'dense' but 'airy' - use white space to separate groups, not lines.
Primary action buttons should always be pill-shaped (rounded-full).
Use data-testid attributes for all interactive elements.
